summary: Custom Khajiit Follower based off my Character. Rogue based class with One-hand Melee and Bow Combat,Basic Stealth Perks. Can Be found in Drunken Huntsmen. Marriageable with Nord even tone audio files.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Ri'Affri-Ja Follower ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ri'Affri-Ja is a Khajiit Follower base on my In-game Khajiit character.
She is a mid aged Khajiit who was exiled and became a local hunter and mercenary at Whiterun.

She can be found in Drunken Huntsmen shortly after entering Whiterun
to the left.She come's with equipped Branded Iron set, Orcish Dagger,
and Imperial Bow.She is Marriageable with Nord even tone audio files.

Base stats: One-Hand:20,  Light-Armor:15, Health:100, Two-Hand:15,  Shield:15, Magicka:90, Archery:20, Sneak 15
Stamina:115, Heavy-Armor:15, All-Magic:15,  Light-Armor:15
*note all stats based on Lvl:1*

Tech Info:ClassRogue Combat Style HumanMelee7
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Enjoy her & have fun ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

For Best Results Please use:

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Coverkhajiits by mrLenski:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941

And body Texture's from
Dagi-Raht Khajiit race by Nuska:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20627
*note With Permission from Nuska's the Body Textures will be available as
optional file here*

Credits and distribution permission Author notes.

Please contact me on further distribution, some assets in this file are not mine and that being said, they can not be used without permission from there author. You must get permission from me before you are allowed to use any of the assets in this file, You must get permission from me before you are allowed to modify my files to improve it ,You are not allowed to convert this file to work on other games under any circumstances,You are not allowed to upload this file to other sites under any circumstances, Some assets in this file belong to other authors. You will need to seek permission from these authors before you can use their assets


Credits
Dagi-Raht Khajiit race by Nuska: For amazing optional bodytexture's
Original mod found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20627

*note haven't upload a mod In a long time suggestions and Improvements
welcome to both file and mod or info page*
author: gtmaddog
